game.name: Soul Descent: Invade of Ether
game.genres: Action, Adventure, Casual, RPG, Free To Play
game.shortDescription: Command the Time Authority and rewrite destiny in Soul Descent! You must recruit and lead a team of beautiful spirit-vessel maidens, while uncovering forbidden truths, and fighting in dazzling 3D battles. Your decisions stir old wars, ignite romance, and shape the world’s future.
game.shortDescriptionEn: Command the Time Authority and rewrite destiny in Soul Descent! You must recruit and lead a team of beautiful spirit-vessel maidens, while uncovering forbidden truths, and fighting in dazzling 3D battles. Your decisions stir old wars, ignite romance, and shape the world’s future.
